channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hole, 1st February

item.title: About a dozen very deeppotholes, 1st February
item.description:
On a stretch of Hartley Lane just north of the roundabout at Seven Springs, over some fifty yards there are about a dozen deep potholes. They have deteriorated substantially over the past month.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hartley Lane, Seven Springs
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unsecured traffic light, 1st February
item.description:
The top right traffic light is swinging in the wind and is not fixed to the pole anymore.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Monhole covers, 31st January
item.description:

item.title: Shared path in appalling condition, 30th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 80 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Parking on ZigZags, 30th January
item.description:
Repeated parking on zigzags outside Castle Hill School. Parking opposite driveways and blocking exit. Zig zags have faded considerably.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Castle Hill Drive, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trip Hazard Water Stoptaps, 29th January
item.description:
Over time the paving/infill around this pair of STW stop tap covers has sunk, or otherwise eroded to the point where they now present a tripping hazard. Location: on the pavement/footpath outside nos. 99 and 101 Ashlands Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 97 Ashlands Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
